events.name: Our 1st Get Together Session
events.description: Hi everyone :) This will be an informal get-together and get-to-know-one-another session at District 10 Bar @UE Square.  Just come down and join us for a casual night out. Pay for your own drinks.
events.location: District 10 , 81 Clemenceau Ave #01-15/16/17 UE Square Shopping Mall Singapore 239917

events.name: Introduction to Mesosphere Datacenter Operating System DC/OS by Benjamin Hindman
events.description: Benjamin Hindman, co-creator of Apache Mesos, founder and chief architect of Mesosphere, Inc, will be kicking off our first community meetup at IDA Hive! He will give some background on the origins of Apache Mesos and DC/OS, and his vision on how this would shape the industry. He will also introduce how DC/OS works, and how it relevance to the industry that is aggressively adopting containers, big data and analytics to drive agility and cost optimisation. The session will be filled with uses cases such as Uber, Verizon and even Microsoft Azure, and there will be time for questions and networking. We hope to be able to build a vibrant community that uses and contributes to the DC/OS open source project, and adapt it to suit the needs of our region. Looking forward to meeting everyone!
events.location: IDA Hive, #08-01 Sandcrawler, 1 Fusionopolis View, Singapore 138577

events.name: 8 Shenton Way, #10-00 AXA Tower  Red Hat Asia Pacific Pte Ltd, Singapore
events.description:
Hi Guys  

Happy to let you know a 2 new DEMO session is added  - Mgration of a VM from VMware to  OpenStack - Chargeback of instances across multiple OpenStack environments Thanks Anil  







Hello Stackers Hoping you will be able to join us for next SG OpenStack meetup.  Agenda for Meetup - OpenStack Triple Based installation  - Openstack Ceph Storage Q & A ,General discussion on Emerging technologies & next Meetup directions  during drinks break . If you would like to speak/present on any aspect of OpenStack or would like to share real world examples with best practices, challenges, etc please let us know. Thanks To Redhat for sponsoring it again !!! 



** Event is posted in all 3 Openstack Groups Please RSVP to only 1 Group , in case you are member of multiple openstack groups
events.location: 8 Shenton Way, #10-00 AXA Tower, Red Hat Asia Pacific Pte Ltd, Singapore
